name: Dead Dungeon Dash
description:
You've been trapped in the dungeon of an ancient wizard's home.  Many days and nights tossing and turning from hunger, but you eventually fell asleep.... for years.  Eventually, you woke up, with a new mysterious power.

Controls:
Move Left: 'A' Key, Left Stick, or D-Pad Left
Move Right: 'D' Key, Left Stick, or D-Pad Right
Jump: Space Bar or A Button
Reset Environment: Tab or Back Button
Quit: ESC

Credits:
Design and Concept by Richard and Sara Tynan
Programming and Art by Richard Tynan

Main Theme by Battlecry, 'Untouched Path 1' from Electronic Game Music Collection from gamedevmarket.net
